Text:
I don't understand the 'meant for playback on PS3'. You select a codec, select a wrapper and render it from any movie editing software you like. Or you up the DVD, if one was made ;)

But I've heard this is the best of the sequels, so until JayRay ups his I'm gonna give it a try and feedback anyway :) Cheers m8
Ahem, my mistake, too many tabs open. Gonna give it a go and feedback anyh00. :)
This is not Tremors, it's an episode of South Park. BE WARNED!
Wait, I take it back. Apparently while this is downloading, it takes clips from stuff you've already downloaded and puts them in the areas that haven't been downloaded yet. Strange.
